nodes.text: BB-19H was a BB-series astromech droid that had a gold, red, and translucent red body, with a black sensor. The droid spent time at Maz Kanata's castle on Takodana where he quietly observed the smugglers, brigands, scouts, and spies there.
This holiday-themed droid is a toy that was made available exclusively at Disney Parks in 2019 as part of the Droid Factory toy line.
